Title: Thankful
Plot: Steve has come up with a ""Thankful Book"" and so he's looking to find out some of the things that the characters in the Blue's Clues house are thankful for. We help Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper prepare for the big feast they're having that evening and also find out about what they and Paprika are thankful for. We also get Shovel and Pail's thoughts on this, as Steve grows hungrier and hungrier. Finally, before the big feast, we skiddoo into a picture frame and help some felt friends out with sharin
GuestStars: Austin Brackenbury, Brittney Goncalves, Bailey Green, Malik Horton, Tom Keegan, Alyssa Lamorgese, Nicholas LaPorta, Philip LiVecchi, Gina Nappi, Christiane Szabo, Jessica Staples
